name: M.A.I.D.s
description:
M.A.I.D.s coming soon on Steam!

A new visual novel that tells the story of Mobile Autonomous Intelligent Devices (M.A.I.D.s), whose idyllic way of life in your household was ruined by an unknown and dangerous power. Socialize with M.A.I.D.s to oppose the antagonist, conciliate the conflicting girls, and maybe fall in love!

Game features:

- A rich story about the household with 4 humanized household items, who learn how to come through the pandemic as a family.
- 3-4+ hours of gameplay with 60,000 words of text.
- A gallery with high-resolution images.

Meet the main characters of M.A.I.D.s:

Viki, a light-minded and clumsy vacuum cleaner. She likes to listen to music and attend large parties. Always dreamed to become a sports professional.

Daisy, a cynical but playful dishwasher. She is certain of her own irreplaceability and uniqueness. Don’t offend her, as revenge will be swift. However, she will follow you everywhere as a loyal girlfriend.

Bee, a soft and gentle blender. She is ready to cut anything you need, but she will never cut your heart. Bee would like to earn a favor from her master at any price. Housework brings joy to her life, but her heart yearns for love.

Diana, a sarcastic and feisty dispenser. If you say something wrong or stupid, be ready because she will point it out. Diana is a model who values her independence, and she will only work for those she likes. She speaks plainly and fears nothing.

The game is intended for a 16+ audience.

The game will be available in an English version; we are also considering a Russian translation.
